hero.title: Build with Quran.com
hero.subtitle: Resources, tools, and guidance for developers building Quran experiences.
hero.note: Thank you for partnering with us to build purposeful Quran products.

api-docs.sub-header: Integrate Quran.com data into your applications with our comprehensive API
api-docs.title: API Documentation

issues-cta: Should you have any questions or want to contact maintainers, just write an issue. We will get back to you as soon as we can, insha'Allah.
issues-guide: Typically we use <0>Github projects</0> as the source for what to work on next, what's coming up and what bugs exist that need to be solved. For example <1>this url</1> has list of bugs, things we need help with, and upcoming features.
labs-description: Discover experimental features and upcoming innovations. Share your ideas
main-desc: Explore the programs, tools, and documentation designed to help you extend the Quran.com ecosystem.

app-portal.heading: Quran App Portal
app-portal.description: Explore the latest community-built experiences and see what is possible with our platform.
app-portal.oauth-pitch: Ship with Quran Foundation OAuth2 for seamless sign-in and submit your app to be featured on Quran App Portal.

projects.all: We have a number of projects all hosted on Github. You can find them all <0>here</0>. But to outline them:
projects.lead: Open-source projects maintained by the Quran.com team and community.

q-next.name: Quran.com Frontend
q-next.description: Next.js web experience for reading, searching, and listening to Quran.

q-api.name: Quran.com API
q-api.description: Ruby on Rails backend that powers Quran data, search, and translations.

q-android.name: Quran Android
q-android.description: Native Android mushaf and audio player experience for phones and tablets.

q-ios.name: Quran iOS
q-ios.description: Swift-based Quran reader with bookmarks, recitations, and offline support.

q-audio.name: Quranic Audio
q-audio.description: Audio streaming platform and companion mobile apps for recitations.

projects.q-android: <0>Quran Android</0> - written in Kotlin and Java.
projects.q-api: <0>Quran.com API</0> - written in Ruby on Rails.
projects.q-api-docs: <0>Quran.com API Docs</0> - Our API docs portal.

thanks: We look forward to your contribution!
